IsUrl: $t(validation-properties.{property}) needs to be a valid url
IsEmail: $t(validation-properties.{property}) needs to be a valid email
Min: $t(validation-properties.{property}) must be greater than or equal to {constraints.0}
Max: $t(validation-properties.{property}) must be less than or equal to {constraints.0}
IsEnum: $t(validation-properties.{property}) needs to be one of these values: {enum}
PhoneNumber: $t(validation-properties.{property}) needs to be valid phone number
ArrayMaxSize: $t(validation-properties.{property}) must contain no more than {constraints.0} elements
IsPassword: $t(validation-properties.{property}) must be at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
IsDateString: $t(validation-properties.{property}) must be a valid ISO 8601 date string
IsFutureDate: $t(validation-properties.{property}) needs to be in the future
IsPastDate: $t(validation-properties.{property}) needs to be in the past
OnlyAlphaNumeric: $t(validation-properties.{property}) must only contain alphabets and numbers
IsPhoneNumber: $t(validation-properties.{property}) is not a valid phone number format
IsIdentifyNumber: $t(validation-properties.{property}) is not a valid identify number format
